attributes.action: create a new railway line in North Yorkshire, going from Northallerton - Ripon - Harrogate - Boston Spa - Wetherby - Tadcaster - Ulleskelf
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe doing so would
1) Improve tourist access to these towns (particularly Ripon + Harrogate)

2) Wetherby appears to be thriving, and expanding, yet doesn't have a railway... adding a rail link now may be a good idea before there's no room left to put one.

3) Come in handy should part of the East Coast Mainline between York & Northallerton need to be closed either due to maintenance or an incident.

4) Have freight potential, as I understand there are 3 major breweries in Tadcaster.
